meanings.definition: An evaluation of the worth, quality, or significance of something.
meanings.sent1: The movie received high ratings from the critics.
meanings.sent2: The hotel's ratings on the travel website were very positive.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat gave the new toy a ratings check before playing with it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the highest ratings of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's ratings of the students' projects were displayed on the bulletin board.

meanings.definition: A classification or ranking based on a scale or system of measurement.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant's ratings on the food app determined its popularity.
meanings.sent2: The TV show's ratings dropped after the main character left.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's ratings of the acorns in the tree were quite organized.
meanings.sent4: His kindness towards others was off the ratings chart.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's performance set new ratings records in the competition.
